title: SYSTEM.CFG
body:
For some reason its like l3cdn.riotgames.com is being blocked not by firewall doe anyone know anything that could be blocking it? or any other DownloadURL?

I got DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region = NA

replies.body: The information you've provided with the system.cfg is correct.  If you are trying to ping it or receiving an error, you may be experiencing a connection issue with your network.  I recommend reaching out to our tech team through a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they can help you out!
